value: Spartacus: Hello young slave and welcome to the Colosseum of Rome. Now you have to fight as a gladiator with the help of your ||creature|| against opponents and their creatures to obtain the emperors favour and attain freedom.
My name is Spartacus and I'm already a famous gladiator. I'll accompany you on your way to liberty and support you wherever I can.
Listen! The horn calls us for the first fight! Good luck my friend.

Spartacus: Hey ||name||, nice ||creature|| you have there! You are a slave and must fight as a gladiator to survive and maybe one day become free, but for now I am going to be your Mentor and train you. Let's see how good you are.
